content.detailedDescription:
I was out around 11:25 observing the sky, and had turned around heading to the house when out of no where an appearance of a large craft appeared at the south of my woods , and i only observed the back of the craft, it initiated lights on very bright on the back of the craft<square> and initiated forward lights on both sides, but they did not light up the ground or woods below just brightness on the craft and then  from right to left red light back and forth. the lights were white with a tinged of yellow.
the craft was heading south toward the knobs, and then blipped out and was gone.
i want to point out that the lights were very bright and it made it hard to adjust my vision to see the rest of the craft.
i measure this morning  the length of the rear end of the craft of what i could see  and it was in the measurement of 90 to 100 feet across.
content.summary: Observed large ship over my country property

content.detailedDescription:
I was early awaken for any reason. i went to my car and saw that 5 large circles of light, in the sky beneath the village i live with my wife and kids.
it stayed 10 minutes and disappear.
it's not an usual lights phenomenon, even if the day was coming. i'm observing nature till i'm a kid. it's something special, i don't know why i'm sure of it.
content.summary: Like planes tracks, but circular and lightening

content.detailedDescription: Was headed home from getting a burrito. i was looking out the window south when i saw the object. when i first seen the object i thought it was a flare. it was moving from east to west very fast and it changed colors then disappeared. i was not sure what it was in my mind because flares don't go in a horizontal line.
content.summary: Looked to be a fire ball but it changed colors between green purple and pinkish. then vanished.

content.detailedDescription: I was on the way back from a brass band rehearsal down a dark back road with fields either side, it was about 10pm.  i don't remember anyone else on the road with me, it isn't a well used road, suddenly out of nowhere a triangle/cigar shaped object with red/orange lights on it appeared flying parallel with my car.   it completely messed up my what was well tuned radio with static (it was never the same after that!) there was no noise, it stayed with me until i was due to go under a railway bridge and before i went under it just vanished!  no the layout of the road is different but i will always remember that night! my radio came back but not as well tuned as it was before!  i didn't get a good look at it as i was driving i decided being a lone female down a dark road i wouldn't stop.  i wasn't scared at all, which i have always found very strange, i always thought i would be if anything like that ever happened.   i went to work the next day and told my colleague, who suggested that i phone the aviation authority for our area, we live in a military county, in wiltshire, england, to see if there was any exercises/activity in the area.  i did so and they had nothing, they suggested i call the local paper and report it.  i did so and the person i spoke to said it was strange because that very week they were going to include an article from a ufologist in the area who had seen one the week before, describing the same thing, he saw it in the town next door to where i was.  they put the incident in the paper the following week along with a comment from the ufologist who said that it was good that someone else had seen something as well.   i can't remember the exact date but i know it was march 1998 sometime.
content.summary: Flew parrell to me for about a minute

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a segway tour with my friends in prague. the sun had just set, and as we were waiting to cross the street, i turned around and snapped this photo of a popular museum. upon looking at the photo that night, i noticed the circular lights to the right (our left) above the museum. a pair of lights, then a single one, then another pair. and below it another two pairs. i then noticed a small, faint line of lights in a straight line above the museum, leading to what seemed like an identical set of lights to the first, but on the direct opposite side. i tried to debunk this, and pass it off to maybe telephone wires or lightening poles. but i returned to the museum the next evening, and saw no telephone wires, and the lightening poles are much shorter than where the lights appear to be. in fact, you can see them in the photo and how short they are compared to the height of the lights. i'm not sure what this was, or if anybody saw anything else. i wish i had looked at the photo before when i was still standing there. 

i'm not sure if this is in fact a ufo, or if it's anything at all. i'm hoping you'll be able to tell me.
content.summary: I took this photo of a museum in prague. upon looking after, i saw the lights above the upper left of the building, with a straight line over the museum of smaller lights, and a fainted imitation of the same circular lights seen to the left.

content.detailedDescription: Wrestling with insomnia, i was laying in bed with my window open because it's hot tonight. suddenly it feels like the sky is rumbling and i hear what sounds like an oversized vacuum soaring overhead, and it was moving very slowly. there's quite a thick overcast tonight so i,could see anything but it was moving either very fast to the northeast and just very high, but it lasted about two,minutes before it was completely out of earshot. i am reporting because just in case anyone northeast heard it or better yet saw it.
content.summary: Loud humming ufo over me

content.detailedDescription:
Hey guys on monday night 4/18/2016 i was out in my backyard checking out jupiter and the moon thru my telescope (just a meade etx90 nothing fancy). at 8:38 pm i observed a bright white orb/light high in the sky fly due south parallel with the 5 freeway over sun valley heading south towards burbank ca.  

i was able to get my telescope on the object by setting the view finder in front of the object as it moved away from me (sun valley) gleanoaks and sunland blvd.  i was able to track the object/orb thru my telescope for 3-4 seconds. 

very bright white orb no blinking lights, no sound and no visible structure.  i ran in the house to get my laser pointer and called a friend that lives in atwater and lost the object.  my friend was not able to see the object so unknown what happened after i lost sight of it.
content.summary: Bright white orb flying south over sun valley / burbank parallel with the 5 freeway.

content.detailedDescription: On the 24th may 2014 at 12:19:08 am i've taken 1 photo only of the flotilla formation which flew over my building . i've sensed - felt some changes in the atmosphere & why i've ran outside with my digital camera , hoping i'll get something on it . only in less then a minute there looking up i've seen couple of flashes then i was able to see approximately 3 objects , smiling i snapped a photo of them , upon looking down on the camera's screen i've noticed there were actually 9 of them ! i thank them quietly & 1 of the brightest objects flashed briefly & that was all , all done , all of this seemed as if those uap (components?) flew from north or north -west but to me it looked they'd be flying towards south , yet they made this half u-turn loop over the building & went south-west . perhaps this was co=ordinated effort for me to witness this ;] later upon uploading the pic & lighting the background , there were actually about 2 dozen of them of various sizes & colours . i'm attaching 2 best close-ups  of this bunch .
content.summary: They flew over the building in a half a u-turn type formation

content.detailedDescription: Outside watching the sky..Always watching the sky the first object was just a ball of red hue. the second was one object going in and out of the dark cloud.I felt amazed and stunned like am i really seeing this and what could it be. the objects went out of view.
content.summary: Ufo was going in and out of cloud. 2nd ufo was one then broke up

content.detailedDescription:
I was having to go to the grocery store to pick up a few items and as i stepped out of the house to walk down the stairs to the driveway i looked up at the night sky to view the stars as i usually do by habit. 

immediately i take notice of a intensely glowing white object in the sky to the west / south west and right away there after i see an airplane higher in altitude travelling due north with it's signal lights blinking. 

as quickly as i could (perhaps 10-12 seconds) i took out my cell phone and began videoing the sighting. granted it took me a moment to keep a steady hand and capture as much as i could before i lost the angle to view it as it passed to the east behind my neighbors roof top where i no longer could view it.  

the stars were visible yet not even close to the brightness illuminating from this object as it traveled at a faster rate of speed compared to the two airplanes that flew at higher altitude in proximity. the stars would faint in the background, as were the airplanes.

there was no blinking of lights, nor sound as it traveled by. i would estimate the object was 2-3 miles in the sky with the airplanes being just above around 3-4 miles and possibly climbing. 

even with jupiter and another star clearly visible in the direction of the moon, this object was as bright as the moon itself on a much smaller scale of size. 

lastly, the object tended to appear "blurry" at times, coming in and out of focus of my own eyes. i was wearing my glasses at the time, yet still was hard to focus on. i wear a light prescription.

the video is 2 min 20 secs in length. i believe the entire viewing took place in well under 3 minutes. this version posted is a lower quality due to converting it in order to upload to the site. the original video is 286 mb. compared to the 21 mb version i'm submitting. 

after viewing/experiencing several events in my youth and never reporting or sharing the intimacy of them, i decided this was something worth mentioning for public record as inconclusive as it may be. perhaps someone else took notice of this? 

thank you
content.summary: Observed a brightly illuminated object crossing the night sky from west to east.

content.detailedDescription: I had just got a new droid turbo 2 from the verizon store in silverdale, wa. my wife and i decided to go get some lunch at a local pizza place. i was excited to try out the phone's camera because it was supposed to be a 21 megapixel camera. we were sitting down and i took picture of the surrounding area out the window. i looked at the picture briefly but really never looked at it closer until later that night. as i was looking at the picture i noticed what looked like bubbles in the sky. i zoomed on to get a closer look and noticed that there 8 of these things. they all basically have the same shape, but if look each of them closer the lighting is a little different on each. a couple of the even look like they are tilted to one side. if you look past them and zoom in to the left of them, there are three other objects in the clouds that look similar. then i noticed one located to the right  and up from the original eight and it appears to have a stream behind it. i was shocked and amazed when i saw all of them.My wife and i seen absolutely nothing when i took the picture not until later did i notice them. i showed my wife and son, and they also could not explain what they were.
content.summary: Just got a new phone and wanted to try out the camera

content.detailedDescription:
Saying by to my fiancé 

noise, like a racetrack from far away with a little bit of a doppler effect simultaneously, if that makes sense. it sounded like one object coming and going at the same time. 

for a split second i thought it may be one light going out or an airplane, then another light came on to the right of it. the light dimmed and another illuminated just as the previous one was going out. this happened 4-5 times before i ran inside to get my phone. the light(s) that came on after the first were about 1 light-width away from the first and appeared to be connected by a string of illumination 

feelings: during just curiosity, until i ran in to get my phone. then heart racing. by the time i made it back outside it was gone. 

lost sight as i ran inside but as far as i can tell the object, i think it was a single object, wasn't going anywhere.
content.summary: I heard what sounded like a racetrack from far away. didn't see any cars. looked out from porch and saw golden/copper colored lights starting from the left innuminate and dim as an adjacent one illuminated. this happened 4-5 times and covered maybe 10 deg

content.detailedDescription:
On november 25 2015, i returned home from work and thought i would head out back on my property for a quick hunt for doves. i live in the country so i have access to adjacent farm land. the time i headed out was about 3:30 pm. i walked the fence line and about 10 min. later i was able to shoot a dove from the tree top and it fell into some shrubs. when i tried to fine it all i could hear was the shrieking of a wounded bird until it went silent. i dont give up easily on downed game but it was apperent that it was going to be difficult to find since it fell wounded. time was short so i headed north along the tree lined fence about 15 more min. until i shot another dove, but this one dropped in a puff of feathers and thought it should be easy to find. i then searched the ground for about 15 more min., untill i was able to find it. i new that i had to find it because there was no more time for another i did not want to lose another bird. thats when a normal day was about to change for me. at about 4:50 pm i was walking south again in the same direction in which i came but about 25 yards west of the same tree lined fence. i spotted a large black triangle emediately above the trees moving towards me at a slow rate of speed. my first reaction was that this was an ultralight aircraft. then i thought that since it was getting late he is probably using the fence line for navagation referance and is running very late. the weather was very good for this time of year and may have been why he was out, so i thought. with almost no wind and about 16c. since it was heading almost straight for me and just above the tree tops i decided not to walk directly under its path since i may scare the person with me holding a shotgun in complete comoflauge clothing. i would instead stay put untill it passes by. as it began to peer through the trees and getting near i was amazed that it was not emmiting that loud roar of a small engine. it also was not revealling any type of wing span. the sky was still clear although the sun was setting quickly. the object had no lights and that was my next thought. where was this thing heading and what the heck is it. i was still thinking that someone was at the controls in either a crouch position or a ski position and i was in complete disbelief when it finnaly broke out from the trees. it apearred to be a human from a distance but then i saw no shoulders a elongated head that had the shape of a street light, it was about 6 ft. tall and very slender. the entire body was black but i could not make out any facial features accept that the face colour was grey. it almost appeared like a sordsman suit in the fenncing sport inand  black with a grey mask. as soon as i saw that this was not a human form i reached for my cell phone to take a picture but this took more than a couple of seconds since i carry it in my sunglass  pouch and had my gun in my hand. when i took my phone out i turned it on at the same time i was watching the object when the figure on top vanished completly. i yelled wtf.And turned on the camera function, taking my eye off it for a second it appeared to rotate then back again still travelling at the same speed and direction staight as an arrow with no wobble whatsoever. when i brought my phone up i could see that it now had an l shape to it and i had only a breif chance to at least get a glimps of it but all i got was the trees and  sunset, i moved my phone in a frenzy but it was frozen and would not respond to any function the image was not present in the screen and i just ran to the fence about 20 yards and watched it traval north untill it faded into the dark forest to the north. sunset made it dificult to see and i then looked down at my phone to see if it was working and took 2 pictures of my feet so it apeared to be fine at this point. i walked blackwards for about 20 yards not knowing what to think accept that whatever it was it did not want to be photograghed, thats just what i believed anyway. then i walked home through the open field and at a great distance to the east i saw a sharp beam of light shoot sraight down through the cloud cover to the ground and i could only wonder if was just a coicidence. i am 54 years old
 and have been hunting most of my life and for many years on my property and have never seen anything like this before.
content.summary: Black object. size and shape of a single bed. moveing aprox. 25 mph. tracking very linear

content.detailedDescription: I was at home. the tv was on and my dog started going crazy and i took her out for a walk. i felt like something was watching me or wanted me to go outside. i went outside with my dog and i was followed by what i can only assume was an invisible ufo with a light shining on me. i could feel some kind of energy from it in my head. i walked for a while not knowing what it wanted from.Me or for me to do. then i turned around and started walking home and was followed through my apartment complex by the "light" i don't know what it was i was feeling very strange i was able to capture a few photos which i showed a few people and they dismissed them. i got back home and lost some time and i am not sure what happened but i woke up very disorientated with a very good light sensation over me. i actually felt really goodand my senses were all heightened when i woke up like the cool air on my skin and  things like that. i also felt very motivated and energetic which i hadn't previously.  i remember the tv being on and the sound on the tv being garbled almost like a brain wash sound track would sound like.
content.summary: Dog barking at me a lot felt like i had to go outside i was walking her and was followed but a light the entire time i felt electromagnetism or something from it.

content.detailedDescription: In the summer of 1992, two friends and i were invited by a girl i was dating to come out to go bowling with her and her two friends. she was living with her grandparents in dougway on the military base. we started driving out towards dougway in late afternoon. just before dark we crossed johnson pass (which is a small mountain pass just before a long straight road leading up to the army base). i was in the front passenger seat, my friend jeremy was driving, and ryan was in the back seat of the car. as we dropped down out of the pass and started across the small valley we noticed something stretched across the road. as we came within about half a mile from the object we discussed what we each thought it looked like. i said "it looks like a big piece of plastic or a parachute because the edges of the object were kind of fluttering around on the edges, but it can't be because it's standing about 20 feet high off the road." it also had a white light that was either coming from behind or from inside of the object. i didn't see any direct light, it seemed to be all indirect. we continued to drive toward the object. when we reached a distance of about 100 yards my friend slowed down and stopped the car. just as we opened the doors, the object changed shape! it quickly changed into a cone shape the white light brightened and then streaked straight up with a popping sound scattering dirt and rocks out from the area. the craft left our sight almost instantly and didn't return. both of my friends saw all of these things as well. we all kind of talked about what had happened after that, but never since!
content.summary: On approach of a landed ufo in the middle of the road it quickly ascended out of sight.

content.detailedDescription: I glanced at the sky and noticed a red dot really bright like a red dot from a laser gun flying in the sky and leaving a visible trail at hypersonic speed and flying 310 nw to 110 ne in the stratosphere on 4/18/2016 around 1:15 am eastern standard time near mia international airport, travelling really fast and really high in the sky, like a sr-22 spy plane flying over at an estimated 18000,00 mileas an hour, almost like a saturn rocket reaching the stratosphere in a straight horizontal line, the whole thing lasted around 30 to 45 seconds, before it dissapeared from sight, the sky at the time was clear with high clouds.
content.summary: A red dot leaving a trail, flying in the stratosphere at hypersonic speed in a straight line.

content.detailedDescription:
sun 9:50pm
my wife and i had an interesting  thing  happen last night. about 10:30 i took the dogs out and while standing on our back porch, which is on the south side of the cabin, i noticed a "star" that was more active as far as the light flickering very intently with red and blue or green lights intermixed with the white light. it set still for at least 20 minutes and then slowly sank down below the mountains. i called my wife out and we watched it till it disappeared. nothing about its actions made me think it was an airplane, (it stayed still in the sky) or a helicopter (there was absolutely no noise).   at lunch today i told a friend about it and she got very excited because she saw it last night also and she had watched it for quite some time. she lives between cherry log and ellijay and we live in cherry log. probably 10 miles apart.
content.summary: Pulsating light that was white with red, blue, green randomly intermixed

content.detailedDescription:
I have a photo on my cell phone.
i would like to send it to you.
my grandson and his girl friend took it.
and i got it from them. you need to see it.
the next few days i had saw my own ufo
how can i send you this photo from my cell  phone. thx so
content.summary: Just see picture.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my cousin were at my cottage and we looked at the stars on the jetty by the water. and suddenly 3 objects appeared it looked like stars moving very fast, zigzagging and changed direction in an impossible way. we looked at it for about 20 minutes and after that it just disappeared. we talked about what it might have been, and both was certain it was some type of ufos.
it happend when we were 15 years old and we are 32 years old now and we have not ever seen anything like it again in our lives.
content.summary: 3 starlike objects moving around randomly

content.detailedDescription: I went outside around 10 pm and i seen this same star flickering colors i went back inside to grab my camera i went outside and took a picture with a flash camera my battries died so i go back in to grab more batteries this thing moved closer to me flickering colors like a star i took a picture again this time my camera started to hum/vibrate and somehow this red substance or something came through the back end of my camera i dont know how to explain it and this thing started to transform into an image of something demonic i heard this whirl wind or some sound like it all around me this object i sseen had some figure with a horn in it but i dont know how i seen it aftr it took this second picture these aircraft like jets or some sort came at me from all directions i can feel that they wanted to do me harm its everynight there atleast 2 of them everynight this noise i seen a white ball light going through the fieldsand it dissappeared for atleast 2 weeks straight i shine my red lazer beam at this thing and know i feel like there trying to pull me into the fields at edge of woods i heard my name called from there whatever it is it transformed into this horned being or demon every clear night there around my house so were moveing something going to happen how do i stop this please help me i know they want me whats going on anyhelp would be grateful thank you so much.
content.summary: I tried to take picture with flash camera and it came at me i saw something but i cant explain what it was it felt so evil and i took another picture and my camera shoot out red light twards me like it had substance

content.detailedDescription: I didn't really want to make a big deal of this but just watched a youtube video of a person also from my area post a video of an object very similar to the one i witnessed. even more interesting, he filmed it within a week of the same time period i saw mine, only, two years prior. he says in his video he was filming on 4/9/14, i saw my object 4/16/16. i have always been fascinated by space and watching satellites so ever since i was a child i have always looked to the night sky. i'm very familiar with what satellites look like and also very familiar with what planes and helicopters look like in the night sky, what their flight patterns are and at what general altitude they fly at. i was outside sometime around 10pm having a smoke. i was looking up at the sky when i saw a satellite. i watched it float over my house traveling quickly south to north. i took another couple pulls on my pipe, was about to head in when i looked up to the sky one more time and saw a bright light, traveling slower than the satellite, about half the speed, going from north west to the south east. i noticed it had no blinking lights and no sound. it looked almost just like a satellite but roughly 6 times larger and brighter. almost as if you were watching the star sirius fly over. i wasn't making too much of it but it was peculiar enough i stayed outside and watched it fly over. as it got further away, the neighbors tree started to obstruct my view so i walked over to the other side of my lawn. as i was doing that, it simply just vanished from the night sky. at the least, i wanted to make a report to have on file because it seems i'm not the only one in boise seeing these bright peculiar orbs/ufo's.
content.summary: Witnessed object roughly 6 times the size and brightness of a satellite in flight then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Thought i saw a star so had my grandson get my camera. got a couple pictures but was moving and looked like trails camera wasn't working right. so took a video hard to keep up with moving but it was all different colors. it was still there 2 hours later when i went to bed.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Thought i saw a star so had my grandson get my camera. got a couple pictures but was moving and looked like trails camera wasn't working right. so took a video hard to keep up with moving but it was all different colors.

content.detailedDescription: i was driving down south bound on la cholla just past magee.  it was about 1020 in the morning and i noticed the object hovering over the catalina mountains just north of  the pima canyon area it seemed. i observed it for a solid two minutes as i made my way to ina.  as i watched i was expecting to see it develop a path towards the airport or show that it was moving or give me some sort of an idea that it was an airplane. it is a very uncommon area for an airplane to fly over though and the object just hovered and seem to be rotating slightly.  finally as i reached for my phone to try and film it at a stoplight i looked back over and it was about 15° higher in the sky and then seem to just sort of disappear i'm not sure if it went higher up or what might've occurred but it was completely gone. with the completely clear sky  a plane or other object would've been seen in any direction.
content.summary: Observed as i was driving on an extremely clear day observed the whole time, elevated quickly just as i was about to get my phone.

content.detailedDescription: Amazing live capture of a perfectly spherical orb.  this is not a balloon because it did not have the typical characteristics of a balloon.  it was not oblong, it did not have a drip point on top and it did not have a necktie on the bottom.  it stayed stationary in the sky for about 8 minutes and then moved slowly away for a total of 15 minutes.  apparently, it didn't realize i had a telescope which captured this object at 156x optical.  there was about 15 people witnessing this object at our ufo sighting event.  the video is amazing.
content.summary: Orb captured with telescope at ufo sighting event - 4/17/16

content.detailedDescription:
During our trip to de the "otun national park" in colombia, located 17 km of pereira, we were walking flollowing the otun river taking pictures of birds and trees.
we made a short stop in a bridge searching for ducks, so i decided to took some picture of the river and vegetation.
two days after that, i was checking the pictures in my pc, then i saw the strange object in my picture.
we never heard a sound or something anormal.
could be an ufo?
content.summary: Flying disc or dome

content.detailedDescription: I was headed to bed when i sat at my desk looking out my west window when i saw three lights in the shape of a triangle at first i thought it was a plane but it did not move so then i knew that it was a u.F.O. . i watched calmly  for forty-five minutes untill i fall asleep in my bed. the next morning when i wake up i saw nothing but a power line and a few houses but nothing was where the u.F.O. was.
content.summary: Triangle shaped. blinking lights very random and sporadic pattern.

content.detailedDescription: It was the summer of 2013. it was just after 3am. i was at a residence in ne portland, or. i was laying on my stomach on a couch watching tv. my daughter lay asleep on a matress behind the couch. i felt a pressure. it felt as if something laid on top of me. it was pushing into me. weighing me down. i couldn't move. i couldn't breathe. i felt a sensation at the base of my skull. i heard a voice. it was deep, gargly. i was screaming, fighting yelling at myself as i felt myself being lifted. but i was paralyzed. i told myself to breathe. i screamed at my body to move. next thing i know i woke on the couch. everything else including my daughter seemed untouched. i have spent a lot of time since that night researching extraterrestrial beings, ufos, etc. i have now come to believe my first abduction happened when i was 11 years old. and it's now just coming to the surface for me.
content.summary: An entity came into my room. a strange deep voice spoke in my mind. it spoke a language i've never heard. i felt my body being lifted. i remember screaming and trying to fight it off.

content.detailedDescription:
i was playing football in my garden and suddenly,a black object hovered over my house.
first i didnt realized that at the time because it was in a few seconds disappeared.
i thought the thing saw me because like 5 seconds it was over me and i feel like someone was watching me.After, i was standing there and didnt knew what i really saw.I tried to watch
the object but it was fast and in a few seconds it was over whole switzerland to the swiss alps.It was like startrek or something really fast.
content.summary: It came over my roof and hovered fast in a few seconds to the swiss alps

content.detailedDescription:
i was playing football in my garden and suddenly,a black object hovered over my house.
first i didnt realized that at the time because it was in a few seconds disappeared.
i thought the thing saw me because like 5 seconds it was over me and i feel like someone was watching me.After, i was standing there and didnt knew what i really saw.I tried to watch
the object but it was fast and in a few seconds it was over whole switzerland to the swiss alps.It was like startrek or something really fast.
content.summary: It came over my roof and hovered fast in a few seconds to the swiss alps

content.detailedDescription: My friend likes to smoke cigarettes and i don't so i just stand with him outside when he does. just an ordinary night and we like to look up in the sky especially after dark and talk about space/observe the visible planets/moons. tonight less than an hour ago starting about 2:30 am we both witnessed a upside down diamond shaped craft we both could not explain. we are both aircraft enthusiast and pondered for over an hour on what the craft could be. i even had time to go inside and get my binoculars so we could get a better view. this thing was amazing, it appear in the west out over the ocean with 4 spotlights pointing down under the craft that had an aura like glow to them while it blinked a plasma or laser like green. we could immediately distinguish this craft from the many airplanes that take off from the local airport and fly out over the ocean because this one blinked a bright green light almost like a laser, then a softer brighter white then normal planes, then a deep red laser type red. this thing just hovered for over 20 minutes in place! i ran inside, got my binoculars and we were just observing it when it started hovering very slowly up and down the coast almost searching. at first we thought it could be a spy plane, or advanced drone or craft our military could be testing. we still have no evidence to prove it wasn't, it might be but at this moment i cannot make any assumptions. it seemed to fade out and what i mean by this is when we saw it first, it was small. about double the size of a 747 at 10,000 feet. it then traveled north up the coast and disappeared, reappearing about 10 minutes later from when it had initially started moving. this time it was the same distance out over the ocean from us but it had grown 3-4 times the size. it was as if the first one was a drone and this second encounter was the drone command vessel or carrier type craft it was enormous! it then ascended and descended many times in a weird pattern before sinking to a hover right above the treeline. there was no sound for the first encounter and no sound for the second encounter until after it had went up and down and sank to a hover that's when a really weird jet type hum was heard at a super low frequency. right when i heard it i asked my friend if he had heard it to, as it continued for about 15 seconds. he did and said he had never heard any type of aircraft make that sound before. it then slowly at almost a crawl speed hovered as it made its way down the coast, this is where the fading in and out came into play. this thing went from enormous to the size of the first encounter within seconds! a circle in the middle of the craft immediately became black and everything outside of that circle just faded in transparency until it was no longer observable, it did this a couple of times then returned back to its original huge visible form. after traveling south down the coast it disappeared behind some trees but within 20 minutes it had returned slowly floating back up the coast again to its original spot where we first encountered it. it was amazing because in the amount of time it was there about 3-5 planes flew in the general vicinity of this craft almost as if they were looking for it or didn't even see it and it just slowly sank to a hover barely above the treeline and went the opposite direction of the planes. the first two planes that we observed almost chasing it were the size and shape of a concord jet, these planes we very fast and flew north to south twice one by one. eventually the craft just disappeared, but that wasn't it. in the same place where the craft appeared there was now a bright star shaped object that was glowing yellow and even through binoculars we could only see a yellow ball shaped object glowing a plasma yellow color. this object remained in the sky almost the same size for only a couple minutes then was gone. a little higher in the sky above these encounters, about a half hour later was a bright light blue/white object that looked almost like a star. when it appeared it was a very deep almost teal blue and eventually turned into a light blue then into a white/blue flicker. this disappeared around 3:15 in the morning. we observed these things for over an hour and went over every possible plane or craft that it could of been/every celestial object/or weird phenomena we have heard about our entire lives. i have never witnessed anything like this, i was not scared but excited. my friend was deeply scared but not admitting it besides the constant reference to the world being ended by lasers or bombs and how they could possibly go to war with us. in the end we both agreed it was nothing we had ever heard about besides in science fiction or the x files and the technology demonstrated was beyond anything either of us had seen any military use. we really are not alone and before tonight i only had this theory based on my vast knowledge and love for science/space time. i have physically seen and heard the evidence and will even testify in court as will my friend who witnessed it with me. you can lie detector me, you can claim my accounts were false, you can make me look crazy, or even go so far as to ruin my life. just know that till the day that i die i am a man of my word and i have witnessed something i could only explain based on my knowledge of science fiction. we have very advanced technology in use around our planet and in this solar system, i don't know where they are from. i don't know who or what they are. i don't even know if its a military black ops project. all i know is i saw a craft i had never seen before, it displayed advanced hovering and speed maneuvers, it was pulsing and blinking lights i had never seen a aircraft use, it could fade transparency of huge parts of its ship making it go partly invisible or even entirely invisible, the planes flying around it seemed to not know of its existence flying directly in its path, and i'm pretty sure it exited the atmosphere in a yellow plasma glow when it left and then turned into the color or a degenerate dwarf star(blue) as it traveled wherever it was going before it faded from visibility. whatever it was it was way more advanced than me or my friend had ever seen, we are aircraft enthusiast and this blew our minds. i apologize for not getting a picture but it was really dark and i can not afford a good enough night vision or inferred camera to capture the images. i would have loved to see if thermal energy could be picked up on this craft though! when i get a good enough camera i will post pictures but until then i can only upload pictures of crafts with the same shape. i am not considering the craft i post pictures of to be real or fake, i don't know and i didn't see them i am only posting the pictures for reference of the exact type shape of what i truly saw tonight. again we will testify in court if we are asked to, as to what we have see tonight i can only describe to help understand what exactly was hovering up and down the southern california coast at approximately 3 am 04/18/2016. until i have encountered something else or have documented photographs i will not be posting anything to leave space for other actual encounters, i hope everybody else takes the caution and respect i do to this site so we can better understand what is truly happening in our skies. don't be afraid to look up, educate yourself and stay up to date on current propulsion technology so you are credible. if you can afford or save up to buy a decent infrared or night vision camera do it, every night while we sleep things are happening above us and it might be a threat but how are we suppose to even find out what these things are so we can assess them if the true accounts are buried or discredited. if this was a government black ops project, please release this to the public! this technology will save millions possibly even billions of lives and place our species among the stars where we truly belong. you are only hurting yourself and holding your species down if you are hiding whatever it was we observed tonight. divided we will fall, but together we will rise!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Upside down diamond shape with 6 spotlights on the bottom, blinking a light green, red, white and hovering up and down the coast stopping many times
